recalls.Summary: LOTUS IS RECALLING CERTAIN MODEL YEAR 2005-2007 ELISE AND EXIGE VEHICLES MANUFACTURED FROM JUNE 1, 2004, THROUGH NOVEMBER 30, 2006.  THE OIL COOLER LINE MAY BECOME DETACHED FROM ITS FITTING.
recalls.Consequence: A DETACHED OIL LINE COULD SPRAY OIL ON A TIRE, INCREASING THE RISK OF A CRASH, OR IT COULD SPRAY OIL THROUGHOUT THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT INCREASING THE RISK OF A FIRE.
recalls.Remedy: LOTUS WILL NOTIFY OWNERS, AND DEALERS WILL REPAIR THE VEHICLES AS NECESSARY FREE OF CHARGE.  THE SAFETY RECALL IS EXPECTED TO BEGIN ON OR BEFORE DECEMBER 19, 2011.  OWNERS MAY CONTACT LOTUS AT 1-800-245-6887.
recalls.Notes: OWNERS MAY ALSO CONTACT THE NATIONAL HIGHWAY TRAFFIC SAFETY ADMINISTRATION'S VEHICLE SAFETY HOTLINE AT 1-888-327-4236 (TTY 1-800-424-9153), OR GO TO HTTP://WWW.SAFERCAR.GOV .

complaints.summary: THE DEFROSTER / AIR CONDITIONER / HEAT BLOWER FAN STOPPED WORKING CAUSING THE FRONT AND SIDE WINDOWS TO COMPLETELY FOG UP WHEN IT IS RAINING OUTSIDE.  THE FAILURE HAPPENED WITHOUT NOTICE OR SPECIFIC EVENT.  IT JUST HAPPENED.    THE FIX IS TO REPLACE THE FAN BLOWER MOTOR RESISTOR PACK.  THE MANUFACTURE KNOWS OF THE PROBLEM AND HAS ISSUED A "FIX" TO DEALERS WHICH INVOLVES REPLACING THE RESISTOR PACK AND THEN DRILLING HOLES IN THE COMPARTMENT THAT HOUSES THE FAN BLOWER MOTOR AND RESISTOR PACK.  THE HOLES ARE TO ALLOW CONDENSATION TO DRAIN FROM THE COMPARTMENT.  THE CONDENSATION IS WHAT CAUSES THE RESISTOR PACK TO FAIL DUE TO CORROSION.    THIS IS AN EXTREMELY HAZARDOUS SITUATION AS VISIBILITY IS SIGNIFICANTLY REDUCED AND CAN LEAD TO A FATAL INCIDENT. *TR

serviceIntervals.service_description: Inspect brake pads, rotors, and calipers

serviceIntervals.skip_consequences: Undetected issues may lead to major repairs

stage_progressions.notes: Full bolt-on package with heat management
Smaller supercharger pulley for increased boost

issues.title: Toyota 2ZZ-GE Engine Oil Starvation Under High G-Forces
issues.description: The Toyota 2ZZ-GE engine in the Exige S can experience oil starvation during sustained high G-force cornering, particularly on track, leading to engine bearing damage and potential catastrophic failure.
symptoms: Engine knock under high RPM cornering
issues.fix_description: Install aftermarket oil pan with baffles and accusump system, or replace with rebuilt engine if damage occurred
issues.prevention: Install oil pan baffles, accusump system, and avoid prolonged high G-force driving

issues.title: Clam Shell Fitting and Alignment Issues
issues.description: The fiberglass body clam shells can develop poor fitment, gaps, and alignment issues over time due to stress and thermal cycling.
issues.fix_description: Re-align and adjust mounting points, replace worn bushings and hardware, professional body shop alignment
issues.prevention: Avoid over-tightening clam bolts, regular inspection of mounting points

issues.title: Alternator Failure and Charging System Problems
issues.description: The alternator is prone to premature failure, especially in track use conditions, leading to charging system issues and potential battery drain.
issues.fix_description: Replace alternator with upgraded unit, check and replace drive belt and tensioner
issues.prevention: Regular belt inspection, avoid prolonged idling with high electrical load

issues.title: Throttle Position Sensor and DBW System Faults
issues.description: The drive-by-wire throttle system can develop faults in the throttle position sensors, causing erratic throttle response and limp mode activation.
issues.fix_description: Replace throttle body assembly or throttle position sensors, ECU reprogramming may be required
issues.prevention: Keep throttle body clean, avoid aggressive throttle inputs when cold

issues.title: Gearbox Synchromesh Wear and Difficult Shifting
issues.description: The 6-speed manual transmission can develop synchromesh wear, particularly in 2nd and 3rd gears, leading to difficult shifting and grinding noises.
issues.fix_description: Gearbox rebuild with new synchros, or replace with rebuilt transmission
issues.prevention: Proper warm-up before aggressive driving, quality transmission oil changes

issues.title: Exhaust System Heat Shield Degradation
issues.description: Heat shields around the exhaust system deteriorate and fall off, creating rattling noises and potential heat damage to surrounding components.
issues.fix_description: Replace or repair heat shields, use high-temperature adhesive or mechanical fasteners
issues.prevention: Regular inspection of exhaust system, avoid driving through deep water

issues.title: Window Regulator Failure
issues.description: Power window regulators can fail, causing windows to drop or become inoperable, particularly common on driver's side.
issues.fix_description: Replace window regulator motor and/or mechanism, may require door panel removal
issues.prevention: Avoid forcing windows when they show signs of struggle

issues.title: Air Conditioning Compressor Clutch Failure
issues.description: The A/C compressor clutch can fail, resulting in no air conditioning function and potential damage to the compressor itself.
issues.fix_description: Replace A/C compressor clutch assembly or entire compressor unit
issues.prevention: Regular A/C system maintenance, avoid running A/C when engine is overheating

issues.title: Fuel Pump Relay and Electrical Issues
issues.description: Fuel pump relay failures and electrical connections can cause intermittent fuel delivery problems, leading to stalling and no-start conditions.
issues.fix_description: Replace fuel pump relay, check and repair electrical connections, may require fuel pump replacement
issues.prevention: Keep spare relay, regular electrical system inspection

issues.title: Brake Pad Wear and Rotor Warping Under Track Use
issues.description: Brake pads wear quickly under track conditions and rotors can warp due to extreme heat, affecting braking performance.
issues.fix_description: Replace brake pads with performance compounds, resurface or replace rotors, upgrade brake fluid
issues.prevention: Use appropriate brake pads for intended use, proper brake cooling, quality brake fluid

editorial.tagline: Pure track-bred performance in its most distilled form
editorial.hero_blurb: The Lotus Exige S represents the ultimate evolution of Colin Chapman's weight-saving philosophy, combining devastating track performance with everyday usability. Whether powered by the screaming 1.8L supercharged four or the muscular 3.5L V6, this is motorsport engineering unleashed on the street.
editorial.essence: The Exige S is what happens when Lotus takes their legendary lightweight formula and adds serious power. It's a car that exists purely to deliver the most intense driving experience possible, stripping away everything unnecessary and amplifying everything that matters.
editorial.heritage: Born from the Elise platform, the Exige debuted in 2000 as a hardtop track weapon. The S variant elevated the concept with forced induction, creating one of the most focused production cars ever built by the Norfolk-based manufacturer.
editorial.design_philosophy: Every element serves performance - from the aggressive aerodynamics that generate real downforce to the minimalist interior that saves weight. Form follows function in its purest expression.
editorial.motorsport_history: Dominated amateur racing series worldwide and served as the basis for numerous GT4 and endurance racing programs, proving its competitive credentials on professional circuits.
editorial.engine_character: The supercharged engines deliver instant throttle response with a relentless power delivery that pulls hard to redline, whether it's the screaming 1.8L four or the torque-rich 3.5L V6.
editorial.transmission_feel: The manual gearbox offers precise, mechanical shifts with short throws and perfect gate spacing - a true driver's transmission that rewards smooth technique.
editorial.chassis_dynamics: Razor-sharp turn-in with neutral balance that can rotate on throttle when provoked. The suspension is firm but controlled, communicating every nuance of the road surface.
editorial.steering_feel: Unassisted rack delivers pure, unfiltered feedback with perfect weighting that builds naturally with speed. You feel connected to the front contact patches at all times.
editorial.brake_confidence: Massive stopping power with excellent pedal feel and fade resistance. The brakes inspire complete confidence even during aggressive track driving.
editorial.sound_signature: The supercharged engines produce an addictive whine under acceleration, accompanied by pops and crackles on overrun that announce your presence unmistakably.
editorial.ideal_owner: Serious driving enthusiasts who prioritize pure performance over comfort and want an uncompromising track weapon that's street legal.
editorial.not_ideal_for: Daily commuters, comfort seekers, or anyone who needs practicality, refinement, or easy ingress/egress from their sports car.
editorial.buyers_summary: Buy the best example you can afford and budget for track-focused maintenance. The Exige S rewards skilled drivers with one of the most intense and rewarding driving experiences available at any price.
